QuestData.Title: Following Eddie's Trail
QuestData.Description: My life is equestrian. I'm not a fighter. I could maybe take a trogg or two, but not a whole tribe.$b$bPlease, go into Mistfall Cleft and see if you can find Eddie. Lord Norwington would be furious if something happened to him, and nobody wants to bear witness to that!
QuestData.LogDescription: Follow the trail of Eddie Norwington.
QuestData.CompletionText: Are... are you here to save me?
QuestData.RewardText: You saved me! Those troggs are really scary. They took Hotshot and dragged me through their camp!
